title: Super healthy raw beetroot salad
ingredients: ['2 large beetroots', '3 medium carrots', '1 small piece root ginger', '1 small piece fresh turmeric', '2 cloves garlic', '2 lemons, juiced', '1 tablespoon chilli seeds (optional)', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '2 to 3 tablespoons olive oil or sunflower oil']
